Before we jump into our help session for everyone to ask questions, **Lealem Amenu** will share his experience and recommendations on **how to use genAI (and Copilot specifically) to help with writing R code**.

Drop in, and bring your questions as well as your latest creations and great resources you've discovered!

Note that starting this month, UQRUG happens every **last Thursday of the month, 10 am - 12 pm**.
